abstract: A slight improvement in economic data fed hope that the euro zone was just in a temporary downturn, and not stuck in a recession that could last years.
snippet: A slight improvement in economic data fed hope that the euro zone was just in a temporary downturn, and not stuck in a recession that could last years.
lead_paragraph: FRANKFURT — In what passes for good news in Europe these days, a survey Monday showed that manufacturing in the euro zone was deteriorating more gradually than preliminary estimates had indicated. The slight improvement in economic data fed hope that the euro zone was in a temporary downturn and not stuck in a recession that could last for years.

headline.main: Ray of Light in European Economic Data
headline.print_headline: Some Hope in Europe as Manufacturing Slowdown Eases
